entry.title: Combined summary - Bip-0039/Wordlist - Romanian
entry.summary: The given context presents a quantitative analysis of the frequency and dictionary usage of words starting with different letters and word lengths in the English language. The data covers the number of words, percentage of words, and the frequency of dictionary words for each letter from A to H. The word length ranges from 3 to 12 characters, and the percentages for dictionary words are all very low, ranging from 0.05% to 2.39%. The context provides this information in a table-like format with separate entries for each letter and word length.At 09:07:05 on August 5th, a log was recorded detailing the frequency of words starting with various letters. The log includes the number of words and percentage of those words that start with each letter, as well as the number of characters in those words and the percentage of those words that are present in a given dictionary. Overall, the context provides a quantitative analysis of the frequency and dictionary usage of words starting with different letters and word lengths in the English language.In addition to the data presented, the context also includes four different lists of words. These lists cover various topics such as science, nature, technology, and daily life objects, and include nouns, verbs, adjectives, and proper nouns. The lists consist of a Romanian wordlist for Bip-0039, an English wordlist, a random collection of words, and a collection of common Romanian words.A member of the Bitcoin development team created a new Romanian wordlist for Bip-0039 and requested permission to push it to GitHub. Another member suggested uniquely identifying the words using the first four letters to make restoring from seed on mobile wallets easier. However, there were several occurrences of conflicting words on the list, and the unique identification proposal was not considered a hard requirement. The second member also noted errors in the list, including misspelled words and non-Romanian words, and requested that the necessary corrections be made. The letter 'R' has the highest number of words starting with it, followed by 'S', 'T', 'Z', 'U', 'V', 'P', 'Q', 'W', 'X', and 'Y'. Words starting with 'A' make up 7.86% of the list, with a total of 161 words. However, there were several occurrences of conflicting words in the first page alone.
